players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly among us. We need to look for inconsistencies in voting and discussion behavior."
You: "Charlie's death is a wake-up call for all of us. We must work together to uncover the truth about the mafia among us."
Bob: "Charlie's death is tragic. Diana, you're quick to point fingers at voting behavior when we haven't even voted yet. That seems suspicious to me."
Bob: "Diana, your eagerness to focus on voting patterns before we've even voted is highly suspicious. It feels like you're trying to set a misleading narrative."

You: "Let's focus on the facts and not jump to conclusions. Diana, you mentioned looking for inconsistencies in voting behavior after we've voted. I agree with Bob that your eagerness to do so before voting is suspicious. Let's also remember Charlie's death and look at..."
Diana: "Bob, you're deflecting. I simply stated a fact about how we catch mafia. Why are you so focused on me instead of finding the real killer? Alice, do you see this?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
